tasks.question: What do you enjoy doing most at Christmas, and why?
What Christmas activity do you remember doing when you were a child?
What do you avoid doing before Christmas because it causes stress?
What do you miss having or doing at Christmas now that you are older?
What Christmas tradition do you regret stopping or changing?
What kind of Christmas movies do you enjoy watching, and with whom?
What do you plan to do on Christmas Eve this year?
What do you hope to feel or experience this Christmas?
What do you want to change about how you celebrate Christmas?
What do you promise to do or not to do during the holidays?
What do you need to prepare before Christmas starts?
What would you like to try this Christmas for the first time?
Who do you want to spend Christmas with, and why?
What Christmas moment do you remember feeling very strongly?
What important Christmas task do you always remember to do, and what happens if you forget?
